definition: surname Su/abbr. for Soviet Union 蘇維埃|苏维埃 or 蘇聯|苏联/abbr. for Jiangsu province 江蘇|江苏/abbr. for Suzhou city 蘇州|苏州
Perilla frutescens (Chinese basil or wild red basil)/place name/to revive/used as phonetic in transliteration
to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
powder/cosmetic face powder/food prepared from starch/noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour/whitewash/white/pink

sentences.english: Remove from heat and stir in the flour, baking soda, and almonds until well mixed.
sentences.chinese: 离火拌入面粉，苏打粉，还有杏仁片，混合均匀。

sentences.english: Shampoo with baking soda, and rinse with apple cider vinegar.
sentences.chinese: 苏打粉洗头，苹果醋漂洗。

sentences.english: In a glass bowl, mix the citric acid and bicarbonate of soda together.
sentences.chinese: 在玻璃碗内加入柠檬酸粉和小苏打粉混合。

sentences.english: Keep an extra box near your stove in case of a fire.
sentences.chinese: 靠近火炉旁放一个装有苏打粉的特殊盒子以防火灾。

sentences.english: So, anyway, we put some baking soda in there.
sentences.chinese: 所以，不管怎样，我们会放一些苏打粉。

sentences.english: Karen puts baking soda in the bottom of her litter box.
sentences.chinese: 莫文蔚常在她的垃圾箱底放些小苏打粉。
